languages.text: "Звучит так, что понизу идти опаснее. Может поменяемся?"
"It sounds like it's more dangerous to go below. Why don't we switch?"
languages.original_text: "Звучит так, что понизу идти опаснее. Может поменяемся?"

traits.locale_text: "It sounds like it's more dangerous to go below. Why don't we switch?"
"It sounds like it's more dangerous to go below. Why don't we switch?"
"It sounds like it's more dangerous to go below. Why don't we switch?"
"It sounds like it's more dangerous to go below. Why don't we switch?"
"It sounds like it's more dangerous to go below. Why don't we switch?"

languages.text: «Abajo suena más peligroso. ¿Por qué no cambiamos?».
languages.original_text: "It sounds like it's more dangerous to go below. Why don't we switch?"

traits.locale_text: «Abajo suena más peligroso. ¿Por qué no cambiamos?».

languages.text: “底层甲板听起来更危险，不如我们换一下吧？”
languages.original_text: "It sounds like it's more dangerous to go below. Why don't we switch?"

traits.locale_text: “底层甲板听起来更危险，不如我们换一下吧？”

languages.text: « Il me semble plus dangereux de s'attaquer au pont inférieur. Que diriez-vous d'inverser les rôles ? »
languages.original_text: "It sounds like it's more dangerous to go below. Why don't we switch?"

traits.locale_text: « Il me semble plus dangereux de s'attaquer au pont inférieur. Que diriez-vous d'inverser les rôles ? »

languages.text: 「下に行くのはより危険なように聞こえる。交代しないか？」
languages.original_text: "It sounds like it's more dangerous to go below. Why don't we switch?"

traits.locale_text: 「下に行くのはより危険なように聞こえる。交代しないか？」

languages.text: "Aşağı taraf daha tehlikeli gibi. Neden yer değiştirmiyoruz?"
languages.original_text: "It sounds like it's more dangerous to go below. Why don't we switch?"

traits.locale_text: "Aşağı taraf daha tehlikeli gibi. Neden yer değiştirmiyoruz?"

languages.text: "Hört sich an, als wäre es gefährlicher, nach unten zu gehen. Warum tauschen wir nicht?"
languages.original_text: "It sounds like it's more dangerous to go below. Why don't we switch?"

traits.locale_text: "Hört sich an, als wäre es gefährlicher, nach unten zu gehen. Warum tauschen wir nicht?"
